title: Forgotten Dreams: A Christmas in New England story
description: Wanted: Christmas MagicTen years ago, Mark Campbell broke Kristan Donahueâ€™s heart when he joined the navy and left her behind in their small New England town. Now he's back home for the holidays and wants to pick up where they left off. Can the magic of Christmas help Kristan open up her heart enough to trust again? And can this same magic convince Mark that next to Kristan is where he belongs?
author: Kari Lemor
